sourcesContent: import{keyframes as t,styled as o}from"../theme/stitches.config";const i=t({"0%":{backgroundPosition:"200% 0"},to:{backgroundPosition:"-200% 0"}});export const StyledImageContainer=o("div",{opacity:0,margin:"0 auto",position:"relative",br:"$lg",overflow:"hidden",maxWidth:"100%",transition:"transform 250ms ease 0ms, opacity 200ms ease-in 0ms","@motion":{transition:"none"},variants:{ready:{true:{opacity:1},false:{opacity:0}}}});export const StyledImage=o("img",{size:"100%",display:"block"});export const StyledImageSkeleton=o("div",{position:"absolute",top:0,left:0,right:0,bottom:0,size:"100%",borderRadius:"$lg",backgroundImage:"linear-gradient(270deg,$accents1,$accents2,$accents2,$accents1)",backgroundSize:"400% 100%",animation:`${i} 5s ease-in-out infinite`,transition:"opacity 300ms ease-out"});
